# WebServiceDriver.DeleteWithResponse Method (String, String, Boolean)

**C#**<br />
``` C#
public HttpResponseMessage DeleteWithResponse(
	string requestUri,
	string expectedMediaType,
	bool expectSuccess = true
)
```
